feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Welcome to My Study Notes
entry.content:
Welcome

This is a sample post. You can delete this file (_posts/2026-02-06-welcome.md) when you are ready to start writing your own notes.

How to write notes

You can look at the examples in _examples/posts to see how to format text, add math equations, and images.

\[f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \hat f(\xi)\,e^{2\pi i \xi x} \,d\xi\]
entry.summary: This is where I will post my study notes and paper reviews.
